wordGroup: dealing with problems 处理问题
insider dealing 股市内幕交易
exclusive dealing 独家销售；专卖；独家交易；独家经营
wheeling and dealing 想方设法；不择手段

sentences.cn: 他的商业交易是光明正大的。

sentences.en: He was scrupulous in all his business dealings.
sentences.cn: 他在所做的一切商业交易中都是清白的。

sentences.en: Have you had any previous dealings with this company?
sentences.cn: 你曾与这家公司有过业务往来吗？
